QuotLineItmUseRsrcGrant.name: QuotLineItmUseRsrcGrant
QuotLineItmUseRsrcGrant.description: Represents the negotiated grants for the usage resource that's associated with the usage product added in the quote line item.

GrantQuantity.description: The granted or negotiated quantity of a usage resource associated with the usage product.

GrantType.description: Specifies the type of model that defines how the usage resource is consumed.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when this record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

Name.description: The auto-generated identifier for the quote line item usage resource grant record. For example, QLIURG-00004 or QLIURG-4567.

ProductUsageGrantId.description: The product usage grant associated with the quote line item.

QuoteLineItemId.description: The quote line item associated with the usage product.

TokenResourceId.description: The usage resource of category Token associated with the usage resource related to the usage product added in the order item.

UsageGrantRefreshPolicyId.description: The usage grant refresh policy associated with the usage resource related to the usage product added in the quote line item.

UsageGrantRolloverPolicyId.description: The usage grant rollover policy associated with the usage resource related to the usage product added in the quote line item.

UsageResourceId.description: The usage resource associated with the usage product that's added as the quote line item.

ValidityPeriodTerm.description: The duration for which the usage resource grant is valid, when used with the validity period units.

ValidityPeriodUnit.description: The length of a validity period for the usage resource grant, when used with the validity period term.
